description:
The missing link to the 12-speed Eagle drivetrain. SRAM went back to the drawing board to push their new groupset to 12 speed, and created a new chain to get there. New tech and a new manufacturing make what could be the quietest, strongest, most wear-resistant chain in the world.

  • Flatter plate results in noise reduction, more consistent chain riveting and greater strength
  • Chain links feature smooth radius and no chamfers for reduced friction and wear
  • Durable black oxide technology and nickel plating
  • Eagle Powerlock chain connector improves chain guiding and longevity
  • Durable chrome hardened solid pins
  • 126 links
name: SRAM GX Eagle 12 Speed Chain
